item.title: Configuring ZSH on Linux
item.author: Author
item.description: Install ZSH.[1] $ sudo dnf install -y zshAdd /usr/bin/zsh to /etc/shells.[2] $ command -v zsh | sudo tee -a /etc/shells /usr/bin/zshSet the default shell to zsh. $ chsh -s `which zsh` Changing shell for jordan. Password: Shell changed.Now, open up a fresh terminal session to start using zsh. oh-my-zshIf you don’t already have git install it in order to retrieve oh-my-zsh. $ sudo dnf install -y gitInstall the oh-my-zsh git repository.
